extendedInfo.description: Shocked by your latest roaming phone bills?Tired of missed calls or lack of mobile service right when you need to have an important conversation?ChooseMyNetwork helps you to lower your international mobile phone bills and get the best quality of service while travelling abroad. ChooseMyNetwork is a free mobile phone application that rates the World's Mobile Operator networks and recommends you which ones to select.It's a fact: while travelling abroad, your mobile phone is usually remotely configured by your home Operator to connect to the Mobile Network they prefer to deal with, whatever the cost of it for you, whatever the quality of the service.As a result you might end using an expensive Operator or a Mobile Operator whose network will cover a little part of the country you visit, leaving you with bad or no service.Choose My Network gives you the control back: our free App for Android mobile phones rates the World's Mobile Networks and advises you which one to select, based on what you want and where you are.It transparently tells you who performs best according to criteria like price, coverage and User's ratings and helps you to connect to it.How it works:- The application displays and ranks the Mobile Networks of the country you intend to visit.- You can check ratings on tariff plans, network quality and user advices.- Choose your network.- Rate it if you wish or post a comment.This application is for GSM, 3G or 4G mobile phone Users. It is not yet compatible with CDMA phones.It requires the GPS and cellular data options to be activated.Want to know more? http://www.choosemynetwork.com

reviews.title: Needs more
reviews.comment: Needs one button quick switch and widget operator list for freequent users. No android black screens at settings.
